title: Plague
data:
| )   Plague   *(No tile)*              |                                                                                                              |
| ------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Base item                             | [dark elven bow](/wiki/Dark_elven_bow "Dark elven bow")                                                      |
|                                       |                                                                                                              |
| Damage vs. small                      | [arrow](/wiki/Arrow "Arrow") damage **+7**                                                                   |
| Damage vs. large                      | [arrow](/wiki/Arrow "Arrow") damage **+7**                                                                   |
| To-hit bonus                          | **+5**                                                                                                       |
| Bonus versus                          | *(any)*                                                                                                      |
|                                       |                                                                                                              |
| Weapon skill                          | [dark elven bow](/wiki/Dark_elven_bow "Dark elven bow")                                                      |
| Size                                  | one-handed                                                                                                   |
| Affiliation                           | [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")                                                                           |
|                                       |                                                                                                              |
| When carried                          | *(none)*                                                                                                     |
| When wielded                          | - [poisons](/wiki/Poison "Poison") arrows
- [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") | *(none)*                                                                                                     |
|                                       |                                                                                                              |
| Base price                            | 6000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                           |
| Weight                                | [30](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                  |
| Material                              | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                                                                                    |

**Plague** is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), and [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"). It is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") aligned in all appearances, and typically favors [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
- [2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
- [3 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
- [4 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)

## SLASH'EM

Plague is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")-aligned and grants +5 to-hit and +7 to damage when firing arrows from it; arrows fired from Plague are auto-[poisoned](/wiki/Poison "Poison"), and it confers [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") while wielded. As dark elven bows are not randomly generated, it will not generate randomly, but may be given as a sacrifice gift or [wished](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for[\[1\]](#cite_note-1).

## dNetHack

In dNetHack, Plague is a normal bow made from [bone](/wiki/Bone "Bone") and can be invoked to temporarily treat arrows it fires as coated in filth: these arrows have a 20% chance of instantly killing monsters without [sickness resistance](/wiki/Sickness_resistance "Sickness resistance"), who then explode - the explosion's size depends on the slain monster and deals 6d6 damage to monsters caught in it. It also confers sickness resistance while wielded.

## SlashTHEM

In addition to its traits in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM also makes Plague available at [The Forge](/wiki/The_Forge "The Forge").

## SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), Plague's flat bonuses are changed to dice rolls: it does +d7 damage and +d5 to-hit compared to a regular dark elven bow. It is a sacrifice gift for [Drow](/wiki/Drow "Drow").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Plague\&action=edit)*

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) While dark elven bows will generate on monster [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Drow (SLASH'EM)"), weapons generated as part of a monster's [inventory](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") are not randomly converted to artifacts, so these will never be Plague.

Plague is an artifact bow that appears in SLASH'EM, dNetHack, SlashTHEM, and SpliceHack. It is chaotic aligned in all appearances, and typically favors drow.

Contents

  • 1 SLASH'EM
  • 2 dNetHack
  • 3 SlashTHEM
  • 4 SpliceHack

SLASH'EM

Plague is chaotic-aligned and grants +5 to-hit and +7 to damage when firing arrows from it; arrows fired from Plague are auto-poisoned, and it confers poison resistance while wielded. As dark elven bows are not randomly generated, it will not generate randomly, but may be given as a sacrifice gift or wished for[1].

dNetHack

In dNetHack, Plague is a normal bow made from bone and can be invoked to temporarily treat arrows it fires as coated in filth: these arrows have a 20% chance of instantly killing monsters without sickness resistance, who then explode - the explosion's size depends on the slain monster and deals 6d6 damage to monsters caught in it. It also confers sickness resistance while wielded.

SlashTHEM

In addition to its traits in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM also makes Plague available at The Forge.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, Plague's flat bonuses are changed to dice rolls: it does +d7 damage and +d5 to-hit compared to a regular dark elven bow. It is a sacrifice gift for Drow.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
  1. ↑ While dark elven bows will generate on monster drow, weapons generated as part of a monster's inventory are not randomly converted to artifacts, so these will never be Plague.
